briefTitle: One-Piece Hydrophobic Acrylic Intraocular Lens in Subjects Undergoing Cataract Extraction
officialTitle: A Prospective Multicenter Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety and Effectiveness of a Bausch + Lomb One-Piece Hydrophobic Acrylic Intraocular Lens in Subjects Undergoing Cataract Extraction
summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of the enVistaÂ® One-Piece Hydrophobic Acrylic intraocular lens (IOL), following primary implantation for the visual correction of aphakia in adults 18 years of age or older in whom the cataractous lens has been removed by an extracapsular cataract extraction method (eg, small incision phacoemulsification).
